basicInfo.notes: Founded in 2004 in Sofia by university friends from American University in Bulgaria. CEO is Nikolay Todorov. 500+ employees. Powers 3M+ domains across 6 continents. Migrated entirely to Google Cloud infrastructure in 2020. Offices in Sofia, Plovdiv, Stara Zagora (Bulgaria), Madrid (Spain), and Alexandria, VA (US). Known for premium WordPress hosting and excellent support.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: Monthly subscriptions excluded; Cloud hosting only 14 days; Domains non-refundable (may be charged if waived initially); Third-party services non-refundable; SSL certificates non-refundable; Reseller hosting non-refundable; SiteGround Wallet balance non-refundable; TOS violators not eligible

serverPerformance.cdnProvider: Cloudflare CDN (170+ edge locations via Google Cloud)

securitySsl.sslProvider: Let's Encrypt (Wildcard SSL when using SiteGround DNS)

policiesOverages.storageOveragePolicy: Must upgrade plan; inode limits enforced strictly
policiesOverages.accountSuspensionPolicy: Exceeding inode limits causes suspension; TOS violations lead to termination; abuse investigated promptly
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Exceeding inode limits (200K-600K depending on plan); excessive CPU usage; hosting prohibited content; using >80% inodes blocks git repo creation
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Renewal 6x higher than promo ($2.99 → $17.99); No free domain included; Cloud hosting only 14-day refund; Monthly subscriptions excluded from money-back guarantee; On-demand backups only on GrowBig+; No traditional VPS offering; $35 per additional migration

business.affiliateCommissionAmount: $50-$100 per sale (1-5 sales: $50, 6-10: $75, 11-20: $100, 21+: custom); 60-day cookie; weekly PayPal payout; no minimum threshold; free to join

editorial.knownIssues: Renewal prices 6x higher than promo ($2.99 → $17.99); No free domain included (most competitors include one); Strict inode limits can suspend accounts; Cloud hosting only 14-day refund; Monthly plans excluded from money-back guarantee; No traditional VPS offering; On-demand backups require GrowBig+; $35 fee for additional migrations; Entry-level StartUp plan limited (no staging, no on-demand backups)
editorial.bestFor: WordPress users needing premium managed hosting; Users prioritizing excellent 24/7 support (phone/chat/ticket); Performance-focused sites (Google Cloud infrastructure); Developers needing staging/Git/SSH; International users (10 data center locations); Users wanting 30-day backup retention; Security-conscious users (AI anti-bot, WAF)
editorial.avoidIf: Budget-conscious at renewal (6x markup); Need free domain included; Want traditional VPS hosting; Prefer cPanel over proprietary panels; Need cheap entry-level hosting; Sensitive to strict inode limits
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Higher renewal than Hostinger ($17.99 vs $10.99) and Namecheap ($4.48); No free domain (Hostinger/Namecheap include one); Better support reputation than budget hosts; Google Cloud infrastructure unique; 30-day backup retention vs 7 days competitors; Stricter inode enforcement than competitors; No LiteSpeed (uses NGINX/Memcached SuperCacher); Staging included on GrowBig+ (similar to Hostinger Business+); Premium positioning vs budget competitors

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Premium WordPress hosting on Google Cloud with industry-leading 24/7 support
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: WordPress site owner who prioritizes performance and support over price

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: SiteGround is excellent for WordPress users who prioritize performance and support, but has the highest renewal markup (6x) and no free domain.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: SiteGround is owned by SiteGround Capital, a Cyprus-registered holding company. Founded in Bulgaria by university friends.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: SiteGround shared hosting starts at $2.99/month (promo) and renews at $17.99/month. First year costs approximately $36.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Yes, SiteGround's Site Tools panel is intuitive, though different from cPanel. Excellent 24/7 support helps beginners.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: Yes, SiteGround includes unlimited email accounts with 10GB per mailbox.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, SiteGround offers premium WordPress hosting with SuperCacher, staging, and auto-updates on Google Cloud infrastructure.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: SiteGround guarantees 99.9% uptime with SLA credits for downtime.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, with a 30-day money-back guarantee for annual plans. Monthly subscriptions and cloud hosting are excluded.
